document.full_text: indonesian islamists hailed osama bin laden as a martyr on wednesday, illustrating sympathy for the al qaeda leader killed by u.s. forces among southeast asian militant groups, one of which predicted a major reprisal attack.
document.title: southeast asia islamists hail bin laden a martyr
lines_and_colors: indonesian islamists hailed osama bin laden as a martyr on wednesday, illustrating sympathy for the al qaeda leader killed by u.s. forces among southeast asian militant groups, one of which predicted a major reprisal attack.
